column3: Bestowed up on the The Lands of Garnd by the Bringer of Autumn. Said to provide the holder with increased vitality.
Throw to deal a minimal ammount of damage
Amazing piece of chest armour definitely not just a long ass name for debugging purposes >:)
Bewitched by the old people of the mountains
Single use double jump for extra height in a pinch!
Basic weapon which is suprisingly sturdy
